name: ghost-prismatic
notes: Colorful crystalline shards with visible hue variation. High fracture separates faces enough for prismatic palette to shine.

name: prismatic-dark-sparse
notes: Jewel-toned fragments. Low luminosity prevents additive blowout, preserving color differences between faces.

name: all-zero
notes: Intimate and starlike. Minimal element count makes individual glow dots readable. Surprisingly beautiful.

name: sparse-ghost
notes: Angular, architectural, readable. Individual triangular faces visible. Structure reads as constructed.

name: all-min-except-lum
notes: Compact bright core with visible sparkle dots around it. Same geometry as all-zero but fully lit.

name: sweet-spot
notes: Balanced midpoint. Good density without blowout, moderate fracture preserves form.

name: scattered-nebula
notes: High density + high fracture. Dual bright lobes with scattered geometry. Nebula-like.

name: structured-scatter
notes: High coherence + high fracture. Tests whether structure survives scattering. Dual-lobe form persists.

name: stained-glass
notes: v2. Two distinct color centers (magenta left, gold right) with individually readable prismatic faces. Extreme fracture + low density + low lum = maximum color separation.

name: dark-jewel
notes: v2. Rich saturated colors at lum=0 — magenta, green, gold, purple. The tightened luminosity range makes the entire dark region viable. Individual faces and sparkle dots readable.

name: dark-teal
notes: v2. Cool, icy, architectural. Face edges clearly visible against deep teal haze. Moody and deep.

name: dark-warm
notes: v2. Rich amber/gold. Like looking into warm amber. Face structure clearly visible at low luminosity.

name: prism-ghost-aligned
notes: v2. Large aligned colored shards — teal, gold, rose, purple. Two bright centers connected by overlapping faces. Coherence creates visible directional alignment.

name: pure-coherence
notes: v2. Nebula-like. Minimal geometry + maximum coherence creates atmospheric form with visible tendrils and scattered sparkle dots around a soft compact core.

name: aurora-warm
notes: v2. Warm amber glow with aligned structure. Dark geometric silhouettes in foreground create depth. Coherence gives directional flow.

name: dark-crystal
notes: v2. Near-monochrome/grayscale at dark params. Uniquely stark — geometric wireframe feel. The palette's narrow hue range becomes achromatic at low luminosity.
